statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING total_products > 2 ORDER BY total_products DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE product_category LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM applications WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(app_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC, product_category ASC, price
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price
SELECT app_name, supported_product_categories FROM applications WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(app_name) > 10
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity > 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT category, name, quantity FROM Products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductImages WHERE is_primary = TRUE;
SELECT product_id, in_stock FROM Inventory WHERE in_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT p.name, p.category, i.in_stock, i.reserved FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id WHERE i.in_stock > 0 AND i.reserved = 0;
SELECT p.name, pi.image_url FROM Products p LEFT JOIN ProductImages pi ON p.id = pi.product_id WHERE pi.is_primary = TRUE;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.name, t.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM Transactions t JOIN Products p ON t.product_id = p.id ORDER BY t.quantity DESC, t.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT order_id, total_price FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE oi.quantity >= 2 ORDER BY oi.quantity DESC, oi.unit_price ASC;
